name: Blizzard 4 (V)
Lore: 'Staffed by an experienced crew. Blizzard 4''s role in all engagements is to seek out new terrain uncovered by the initial offense thrust and unload troops to hold it. Enclosed.',
Text: 'May add 1 pilot and 6 passengers. Permanent pilot provides ability of 2. When deployed, may deploy a non-pilot Imperial warrior aboard (for free). Immune to attrition < 4.',
